description:
One day, Regro received a letter from Mash which delighted him with details of Mash`s recent experiences. However, the contents of the letter were not what Regro had expected from school life. They were full of danger, surprises, and much confusion.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mash Burnedead and the Mysterious Letter
Mash Burnedead et la lettre mystérieuse
Mash Burnedead to Fushigi na Tegami
マッシュ・バーンデッドと不思議な手紙
